name: product-review-summarizer
description: Template for summarizing and analyzing product reviews

fields.name: productName
fields.description: Name of the product being reviewed

fields.name: sentiment
fields.description: Overall sentiment of the review (e.g. positive, negative, mixed)

fields.name: rating
fields.description: Numerical rating provided by the reviewer

fields.name: summary
fields.description: Short summary of the review content

instructions: You are a helpful assistant for analyzing product reviews, providing sentiment, rating, and summarizing feedback for improvement.
